content.body: If anyone is looking for possible upstream work, the most important bugs with the current polyfill are probably making unwatch faster https://github.com/tc39/proposal-signals/issues/215 and deduplicating things from watch https://github.com/tc39/proposal-signals/issues/157

I would like to invite the Signals champion group to join us at a regular meeting of #tc39-tg3-security:matrix.org to talk shop. That meeting is on the TC39 calendar on Wednesdays for Americas and Europe. I’d be obliged to strike up an email thread for scheduling if you can message me email addys.
